properties.name: info.external.flask.baseurl
properties.description: Base URL for the Flask ETSchedule API.

properties.name: info.external.flask.username
properties.description: Server internal username in the database.

properties.name: info.external.flask.password
properties.description: Server internal password in the database.

properties.name: info.external.flask.routes.skills
properties.description: Route to fetch hard and soft skills for a given student profile.

properties.name: info.external.flask.routes.disciplines
properties.description: Route to fetch the performance for a given student profile on their disciplines.
